Get the artifacts of a training job.

  parameters={[{"name":"job_uuid","in":"query","description":"The UUID of the job to get the artifacts of.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>

</RequestSchema>
